snippet.title: Shapeshifter CO-OP action RPG - Coridden Updated Trailer 2023
snippet.description:
An updated gameplay trailer for the upcoming cooperative action RPG Coridden. If you find our game promising we are grateful if you'd like to wishlist it on Steam !✨https://store.steampowered.com/app/1656930/Coridden/ 
You can also come chat with us at our discord server: https://discord.gg/invite/fFdRsDW6Af
Or join our mailing list at the bottom of our website: https://coridden.com 

-----------------------------------
🔷More info about Coridden🔷
In this Action RPG you are a monster-shifter, able to become the beasts you defeat. Venture out solo or in CO-OP, grow both your human and beast powers on a journey to uncover the dark secrets sealed away inside a legendary city and save what you hold dear. 
🐲- Shapeshift between your human and beast form freely to utilize each form's strengths and skills when needed.
⚔️- Intense combat action where both your own skills and character gear matters. 
💪- Build up both your human and monster form with new gear, attributes and active and passive skills as you level up. Choose from 4 human classes and train one or more of the 7 beast masteries available.
🤝- Up to 4 players can play together in drop in/drop out co-op gameplay, both locally and online. In co-op you also unlock a special team mechanic: ride on each other’s back for mounted combat! (No worries, if you have no friends you can conjure a beast to ride on)
🗺️ - Alongside your main quest you can explore the open areas further to find hidden treasures and complete side quests in an unusual science fantasy world. You can also take on missions for the City Guard, that get harder and harder the further you progress.

🔶More info about the developers, Aftnareld🔶
We started to make games as a hobby, but with the years our ambitions grew and our passion project also. Being a gaming couple we knew that co-op games was something we definitely wanted to do from day one. We've been working on Coridden half-time since 2018 (started the project a bit before that, so +5 years in the making already!), learning a lot along the way and constantly improving us and the game. During these years we've had help from several people along the way with 3D, Sound, Music, UI and more, we are super grateful for all of them being a part of our journey!

------------------------
We know the grand ARPG Diablo 4 is around the corner... But no harm in putting Coridden on your wishlist to have a a fun break/something new to late 2023/early 2024 right? ;)
